item.title: About me
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description:
My name is Paolo Fullone. I am a backend software engineer with a strong focus on C# and .NET technologies. I have a passion for building scalable and efficient microservices architectures, RESTful APIs, and cloud-based systems. My experience includes working with various databases, messaging systems, and performance optimization techniques. I am committed to writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices in software development.

I was born in Brazil, but I also have Italian Citzenship.
